channel.title: Slowloris on Miaoyu Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Slowloris on Miaoyu Blog

item.title: Talk about Slowloris and slow HTTP attacks
item.description: Talk about Slowloris and slow HTTP attacks Slowloris is back? Slowloris, a DDoS attack tool that has been around for at least a decade, has suddenly come back into the picture. Microsoft suffered a DDoS attack in June this year that affected Azure, Outlook, OneDrive and some other businesses. Finally, Microsoft officially disclosed the attack, the details can be referred to: Microsoft Response to Layer 7 Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) Attacks | MSRC Blog | Microsoft Security Response Center

item.title: 聊聊Slowloris与慢速攻击
item.description: 聊聊Slowloris与慢速攻击 Slowloris回来了？ Slowloris这个DDoS攻击工具的出现，已经至少十多年的历史了，本来已经不怎
